title: US and other countries say they will hold Taliban to promises to let people leave Afghanistan after August 31
content:
1. US and other countries say they will hold Taliban to promises to let people leave Afghanistan after August 31  CNN
  2. U.S. announces joint arrangement to continue evacuating Afghan allies past Aug. 31  Axios
  3. US Troop withdrawal starts, last 1000 civilians to be airlifted | Latest World English News | WION  WION
  4. Inclusive govt to be formed within days: Mujahid  Pajhwok Afghan News
  5. The Observer view on the resurgence of the Taliban  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 米国をはじめとする各国は、8月31日以降に人々をアフガニスタンから退去させるという約束をタリバンに守らせるとしています。
美国和其他国家表示，他们将要求塔利班履行承诺，让人们在8月31日之后离开阿富汗
美國和其他國家表示，他們將要求塔利班履行承諾，讓人們在8月31日之後離開阿富汗
